A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It had its moments but overall the tone was too jokie\, main plot was thin\, and they didn’t give you more information about ray and snoke. I realize that sometimes in life there isn’t a reveal or a twist but it is Star Wars so in this case not having a middle movie reveal was very disappointing. Overall it works enough that it won’t sink the trilogy but it certainly didn’t leave me saying\, hot damn\, now that was a Star Wars movie.
